title: Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS Released with Linux 6.2 Kernel and Mesa 23.0 Graphics Stacks
description:
The Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) distribution is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.2 from Ubuntu 23.04 (Lunar Lobster), Mesa 23.1.4, as well as various other updated components.

The post Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS Released with Linux 6.2 Kernel and Mesa 23.0 Graphics Stacks appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
